local filter = Object():LoadTargetDefinition(6) local max_victims = filter:Count() local player = EffectController()
if max_victims > 0 then player:SetTargetCount(max_victims) for i=0,max_victims-1 do player:SetTargetPrompt( i, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_CREATURE_TO_TAP_GET_PLUS1_PLUS1_COUNTER" ) end player:ChooseTargets( 6, EffectDC():Make_Targets(1) ) end

local filter = Object():LoadTargetDefinition(6) local max_victims = filter:Count() local player = EffectController()
for i=0,max_victims-1 do local victim = EffectDC():Get_Targets(1):Get_CardPtr(i) if victim ~= nil then victim:Tap() victim:AddCounters( MTG():PlusOnePlusOneCounters(), 1 ) end end
